    • Method Detail

      • setFeature

        public void setFeature(int featureIndex,
                       double[] featureImage)
        Method sets specific feature for all layer pixels
        Parameters:
        featureIndex - index for required feature
        featureImage - double[] array where resulting feature image data will be stored in row major order

      • setFeatureFast

        public void setFeatureFast(int idx,
                           int featureNum,
                           double value)
        Fast method to set the element in the feature array. NOTE: the requesting program should scan the array in row-major order
        Parameters:
        idx - - index of the pixel in the column-major order
        featureNum - - serial number of the feature
        value - - feature value / value to set. Type: double.

      • setFeature

        public void setFeature(int row,
                       int col,
                       int featureNum,
                       double value)
        Set the element in the feature array. Type casting (double to float) is done internally
        Parameters:
        row - - current pixel row number
        col - - current pixel column number
        featureNum - - serial number of the feature
        value - - feature value / value to set. Type: double.
